description:
As the name implies this is a simple shopping list program to replace the paper lists that are so easily lost, misplaced, or simple too hard to read.  It is simple and strait forward with just the basic feature you need for a shopping list.

The feature include:
• Multiple independent named lists.
• Items in the list can have short or multi-line descriptions.
• Each item can be checked off as you get it.
• Swipe to delete or use menu options to delete multiple items.
• Sort order options.
• Portrait or landscape mode.
• Always launches where you left off.

Note about TouchPad use:
This app was designed for phones but it does function on the TouchPad well in compatibility mode except that it will bring up the keyboard when you check or uncheck an item.  It’s a good thing if you intend to edit the item you just checked.  It’s inconvenient if you don’t intend to edit it.
versionNote: Added some code so the app will properly fill the screen on the Pre3.
